tool_description: Discover Instagram & YouTube Influencers using various filters such as Follower Count, Category, Engagement Rate, Post Count, Social Platform, City & Country, Keywords in Bio and influencer handle. Choose from a list of 24 curated categories.

api_list.name: Search Instagram and YouTube Influencer
api_list.description: Search Instagram & YouTube Influencers using various filters such as Follower Count, Category, Engagement Rate, Post Count, Social Platform, City & Country, Keywords in Bio and influencer handle.

required_parameters.name: current_page
required_parameters.description: Navigate through different pages of the desired query data.

optional_parameters.name: posts_minimum
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on the minimum number of posts they have shared.

optional_parameters.name: bio_contains
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on keywords mentioned in their Instagram bio or YouTube description.

optional_parameters.name: posts_maximum
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on the maximum number of posts they have shared.

optional_parameters.name: connector
optional_parameters.description: Search creators either from Instagram or YouTube.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on their country.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on their category.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on their city.

optional_parameters.name: engagement_rate_minimum
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on their minimum engagement rate.

optional_parameters.name: followers_maximum
optional_parameters.description: Filter creators based on maximum follower/subscriber count.

optional_parameters.name: engagement_rate_maximum
optional_parameters.description: Search creators based on their maximum engagement rate.

optional_parameters.name: followers_minimum
optional_parameters.description: Filter creators based on minimum follower/subscriber count.

optional_parameters.name: handle_contains
optional_parameters.description: Filter creators based on specific text in their handle.
